VLT Pack Maven Plugin
Last Published: 2012-12-12  | Version: 1.0-SNAPSHOT
VLT Pack Maven Plugin
Project Documentation
  • Project Information

vltpack:upload

Full name:

net.adamcin:vltpack-maven-plugin:1.0-SNAPSHOT:upload

Description:

(no description)

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven project to be executed.
  • Binds by default to the lifecycle phase: integration-test.

Optional Parameters

Name Type Since Description
autosave int - (no description)
Default value is: 1024.
context String - (no description)
Default value is: /.
User property is: vlt.context.
debug boolean - (no description)
User property is: vlt.debug.
deploy boolean - (no description)
User property is: vlt.deploy.
force boolean - (no description)
Default value is: true.
host String - (no description)
Default value is: localhost.
User property is: vlt.host.
https boolean - (no description)
User property is: vlt.https.
noProxy boolean - (no description)
User property is: vlt.proxy.noProxy.
pass String - (no description)
Default value is: admin.
User property is: vlt.pass.
port Integer - (no description)
Default value is: 4502.
User property is: vlt.port.
proxyHost String - (no description)
Default value is: localhost.
User property is: vlt.proxy.host.
proxyPass String - (no description)
User property is: vlt.proxy.pass.
proxyPort int - (no description)
User property is: vlt.proxy.port.
proxyProtocol String - (no description)
Default value is: http.
User property is: vlt.proxy.protocol.
proxySet boolean - (no description)
User property is: vlt.proxy.set.
proxyUser String - (no description)
User property is: vlt.proxy.user.
recursive boolean - (no description)
Default value is: true.
skip boolean - (no description)
User property is: vlt.skip.upload.
user String - (no description)
Default value is: admin.
User property is: vlt.user.
